survey_name: Professional Networking Platform User Engagement Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess user engagement, satisfaction, and feature preferences on professional networking platforms to enhance user experience and platform functionality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use professional networking platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use professional networking platforms?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable on professional networking platforms? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of user preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable on professional networking platforms? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience on professional networking platforms?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question provides qualitative insights; ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience on professional networking platforms?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the privacy settings on professional networking platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the privacy settings on professional networking platforms?

questions.question_text: Have you successfully built professional connections through these platforms?
questions.client_notes: This binary question with an additional option helps gauge platform effectiveness.

script.question_text: Have you successfully built professional connections through these platforms?
